name: Turtle Quest
description: Play as a baby turtle who has just hatched. Your mission, get to the safety of the sea.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows  7 Processor: Intel i3 Equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX550 or above DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 870 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows  7 (64-bit) Processor: Intel i5 Equivalent or above Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX670 or above DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 870 MB available space Sound Card: Creative ZX or equivalent
